item.name: numberOfCats
item.description: how many cats should be in the swarm

item.name: mixtureRatio
item.description: percentage of cats in tracing mode (should be really small)

item.name: selfPositionConsidering
item.description: in seeking mode: should the cat be able to stay where it is or not

item.name: countsOfDimensionsToChange
item.description: in seeking mode: how many dimensions should be changed

item.name: seekingRangeOfSelectedDimension
item.description: in seeking mode: how many percent should the cat be moving from origin position

item.name: seekingMemoryPool
item.description: in seeking mode: how many copies of the origin cat should be there
